body:
Update: I've successfully added cloning from a revision, however it seems there's a weird state tree issue I'm running into. After cloning a revision, the recipe form cycles between a previous revision's form values and the new clone. Seeing that, I decided to focus on preference experiment addon stuff instead of spinning my wheels.

Update part deux: Looking into fixing the 'preview' button for revisions has really opened a can of worms  - the preview page is always showing the latest recipe, but that's not the expected outcome of the code we have in place, plus some other general weirdness with the recipe forms. I'm almost wondering if it's worth it to wait for the state tree refactor. @Osmose @rehandalal thoughts?
